name: 雙語教育概論（教）
comment: 請選修此門課的學生詳讀課程綱要之上課用書需求
description: This course introduces students to the foundations of bilingual education. The theories and practices driving bilingual education will be discussed with a particular focus on their application in Taiwan’s classrooms. By the end of this course, students will have developed a personal philosophy on bilingual education and demonstrate its application in their future classroom.
goals: 透過本課程的介紹，使學生認識哲學的基本概念及各種教育思想的特點。

methodologies.note: Students will discuss theory and research related to bilingual education.
Students will work in groups for research and presentations.
Students will research bilingual education in other countries.

grading.note: Exit Tickets: Students will complete a weekly exit ticket after each class to reflect on their learning.
Students will complete a written final exam covering material discussed throughout the course.
Bilingual Teaching Philosophy Statement: Students will write a one-page teaching philosophy statement that discusses views of bilingual education and advocacy for students.

Country Case Study: [Group] Students will present on a country of their choice. The presentation should include information on majority and minority languages of the country and education policies related to language learning.
